title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Qualifications and Quality Assurance
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Qualifications and Quality Assurance 
(Education and Training) (Amendment) Act 2019 (Commencement of Certain 
Provisions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited qualification quality assurance (education training) (amendment) act 2019 (commencement certain provisions) order 2024

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. The 1st day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Qualifications and Quality Assurance (Education 
and Training) (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 32 of 2019) shall come into 
operation: 

(a) 

section 9; 

(b) 

section 14; 

(c) 

section 23; 

(d) 

sections 25 to 33; 

(e) 

section 38. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 August, 2024. 

PATRICK O'DONOVAN, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [426] 3
